data.actual_result: It gets lost after the logout.
data.expected_result: The draft shouldn't disappear and always be saved.
data.short_description: Drafts get lost after logging out and logging in again
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and write a message - Don't send the message - Open the user settings and click the logout button - Login in again with your credentials - Go back to the channel with the draft
